projects.title: Pet Shop
projects.description: This is a pet shop web application that I developed using NodeJS and HTML/CSS. The application is also able to show and search the pets that are available for adoption.

projects.title: To-do App
projects.description: It's a CRUD application for project managing and the tasks envolved in those projects. This application was made on Java Swing.

projects.title: Contact Manager
projects.description: This was my first experience with Java EE. It's a contact management web application that helps with the organization of personal contacts. This project was made with Java on the Back-End and HTML/CSS/JS on the Front-End.
